title: Vega
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Organic, Western, Buffet, Take-out, Bakery, Polish
description: The oldest vegetarian restaurant in Poland, established 1987 and became fully vegan in 2013. On 2 floors and renovated in 2014. The ground floor features a buffet spread of veganized Polish dishes, soups, falafels, and burgers. On the first floor is a world cuisine menu.
